page.title: 10HIGH SALVINGTON DESCRIPTION
page.content: This select,semi-rural village suburb of Worthing is situated to the North-West of Worthing,covering a 1.21 km2 area with a Southerly aspect.High Salvington has a high quality environment,a low population density and little noise and air pollution.It has many trees,a large expanse of downland,extensive hedged gardens.The area has attracted the unwelcome attention of developers,starved of available building land within Worthing. Well served by roads,through traffic uses this area as a short cut from the A27 to the A24,benefiting only the Salvington stores with passing trade. with no schools,only one garage and single intermittent bus service,the future looks grim.Large houses replaced by estates,trees uprooted,and the loss of a rare,rural ethos.
